content: Those of you who are members of the AAAI may want to make sure to vote the elections for the AAAI Executive Council, which are open until tomorrow (12 June) midnight PDT (see https://aaai.memberclicks.net/index.php?option=com_mc&view=formlogin&form=266123&return=L2luZGV4LnBocD9vcHRpb249Y29tX21jJnZpZXc9bWMmbWNpZD1mb3JtXzI2NjEyMz9zZXJ2SWQ9NTI1NiZvcHRpb249Y29tX21jJnZpZXc9bWMmbWNpZD1mb3JtXzI2NjEyMw==) As you know, the AAAI supports the CLAIRE vision. Furthermore, several CLAIRE supporters are on the slate of candidates, including Francesca Rossi (who is a candidate for AAAI President) and Barry O'Sullivan (who is a candidate for AAAI Councillor) - see also https://www.aaai.org/Organization/2020-ballot.pdf.
